issue.title: [CF 1630] Pvp trinket + every man?
issue.body:
Come to love this addon but still kinda new to it. Trying to create a icon that lets me know when target have their gladiators medallion / every man for itself on cd or not. Used unit cooldown then Gladiator's Medallion: 2:00; Every Man for Himself: 3:00 but it only tracks Gladiators Medallion? Or do I need to do 2 separate icons? And is it possible to only show the icon if the target HAVE either of them? Like they shouldt show if im facin a gnome with no every man and no gladiators? Hope you guys understand me ^^ Cheers 


> Posted by CurseForge user Fogelberg86 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1630 | Raw

comments.body:
Made 2 separete groups and icons and put them above each other so got it to work. Kinda hehe 


> Posted by CurseForge user fogelberg27

Instead of putting two icons above each other, you could use a meta icon. (A meta icon displays other icons, in function of their conditions and the priority.)


> Posted by CurseForge user Portalbendarwinden

Ok Will try it. But like i wrote first. If I typ both every man and gladiators in one Icon I just get the first one I write to work? 


> Posted by CurseForge user fogelberg27
